LanguageData.TiberAddHediff.label: 타이백신 효과
LanguageData.TiberAddHediff.description: TiberAdd makes sure that your pawn has a steady supply of Tiberium need, without risking to wander the deadly fields of green.
LanguageData.TiberAddSide.label: 티버애드 부작용
LanguageData.TiberBlockHediff.label: 타이블록 효과
LanguageData.TiberBlockHediff.description: TiberBlock makes sure to immunize your pawn from any Tiberium effects temporarily. It will help recover from crystallization, as long as the part isnt fully crystallized.
LanguageData.TiberBlockSide.label: 타이블록 부작용
